notes.text:
This update for exempi fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2020-18651: Fixed a buffer overflow in ID3 support (bsc#1214486).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: Buffer Overflow vulnerability in function ID3_Support::ID3v2Frame::getFrameValue in exempi 2.5.0 and earlier allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service via opening of crafted audio file with ID3V2 frame.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
